IDEAL_NOISE_CUTOFF.name: Noise Contrast Cutoff
IDEAL_NOISE_CUTOFF.description: Contrast values under this value will be considered as noise.

ABS_MAX_Z.name: Maximum Safe Z
ABS_MAX_Z.description: The maximum value of Z (read by the joystick in um), so that the 20x lens doesn't hit the stage. MUST RECALIBRATE IF THE CRANK IS TURNED

FIND_DIR_DIST.name: Find Direction Step Size
FIND_DIR_DIST.description: The small distance in um to go up and down to see if the contrast increases.

FAST_MOVE_REL_TIME.name: Fast Relative Move Wait Time
FAST_MOVE_REL_TIME.description: Time to wait for a fast (small) relative move in seconds. No reason to go over 0.6.
